channel.title: What is Artificial Intelligence (AI)?
channel.description:
Watch this discussion to know about the [artificial intelligence](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n2r8HP4amnU).It clarifies more doubts related AI.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=n2r8HP4amnU Use this video to improve your knowledge. Then tell me Do you have any other questions related to AI?

item.title: What is Artificial Intelligence (AI)?
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

by the way, most times I forget to give proper props to people. sorry.

welcome @KarthikaQpt and thank you for being the only one forum contributor this year (other than myself) to create an Ai topic.

ps: you might find it a bit interesting to realize my question there (which I asked because you've requested) is still in need of a good answer.

Read full topic

item.title: What is Artificial Intelligence (AI)?
item.dc:creator: @cregox Caue Rego
item.description:
@cregox wrote:

Despite being for most of 2016 completely away from the topic, I still love Ai!

To me, that's a very sad video. It's like a bad hollywood film, filled with production and big names but no content. Again, that's just me.

The only question I've got is: https://www.quora.com/If-we-already-have-algorithms-smarter-than-bacterias-why-cant-we-just-make-a-huge-web-project-and-let-it-run-full-speed-to-evolve-into-Singularity

Read full topic
